frame.label: Motion
frame.slider: Controls how fast you have to move the pointer before the acceleration (below) kicks in.
When the pointer is moved quickly more than the threshold number of pixels, its speed is multiplied by this number.
Controls how far you have to drag the mouse to start a drag-and-drop operation. Set this high if you find yourself dragging things unintentionally.

frame.label: Buttons
frame.slider: Time allowed between the two clicks that make up a double click. Make this bigger if you have trouble double-clicking fast enough; set it smaller if two single-clicks sometimes get treated as a double click.
frame.toggle: Switch button order for left hand use (menu button to the left).

vbox.folder-button: Click to open your private theme folder. You can add/remove themes with the usual filer operations.
